qas.question: What is the population of New Delhi?
What are the most common languages spoken in New Delhi?
What language is used for formal purposes by business and government institutes of New Delhi?
What is the literacy rate of New Delhi according to the 2011 census?
What city in the territory of Delhi has the highest literacy rate?

context: New Delhi has a population of <a0_0>249,998<a0_0/>. <a1_0>Hindi and Punjabi<a1_0/> are the most widely spoken languages in New Delhi and the lingua franca of the city. <a2_0>English<a2_0/> is primarily used as the formal language by business and government institutes. <a4_0>New Delhi<a4_0/> has a literacy rate of <a3_0>89.38%<a3_0/> according to 2011 census, which is highest in Delhi.
